== Majali (602577) ==
      
Majali is a village in the [[Karwar ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1246.18 hectares and harbouring 1958 households with total population of 7665 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[KARWAR]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 3701 and female population is 3964. Scheduled Caste Population is 20 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the village is 602577<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 6343
* Literate male population: 3264 (88.19%)
* Literate female population: 3079 (77.67%)
